attributes.action: Save The Valley Arts Resource Centre  from closure or dispersal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
North Ayrshire Council wish to close our well used and much loved Community Arts Resource Centre, located in Kilbirnie, Ayrshire. They want the building and do not wish to provide us with adequate alternative accomodation. If you care about the arts and/or community development- support us. For more info or to get in touch- www.ka25.co.uk/varc
 Thank You

rejection.details: please remove the links and re-submit
